title: The big winners if Trump and China end the trade war
text:
Car manufacturers, American smaller companies and Chinese technology stocks should expect a boost if negotiations between China and America can lead to the end of the 15-month trade war, according to experts.

Last night, president Donald Trump said these talks were “very good”, while rhetoric from within the White House suggested they were better than expected.

The tense months have weighed down on share prices across the globe, brought forward pessimistic views on economic growth and turned investors off putting cash into stocks.

Following some positive news, Hugh Gimber of bank JP Morgan, said investors were somewhat right to be optimistic.
